Detailed Description

Represents a 2 dimensional vector.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

chaos::gfx::Vector2::Vector2 ( )

Default constructor.

Creates a new Vector2 with the x and y components initialised as 0.

chaos::gfx::Vector2::Vector2 ( float  x,
float  y 
)

Component constructor.

Creates a new Vector2 with the given x any y component values.

chaos::gfx::Vector2::Vector2 ( float  scalar)

Scalar constructor.

Creates a new Vector2 with both the x and y components set to the given value.

Copy constructor.

Creates a copy of the other given Vector2.
